text: <https://www.canada.ca/en/revenue-agency/services/tax/businesses/topics/payroll/benefits-allowances/benefits-allowances-chart.html> tax returnのためこれ必死でみてる

attachments.title: Benefits and allowances chart - Canada.ca
attachments.text: This chart indicates whether the taxable allowances and benefits are subject to Canada Pension Plan (CPP) and employment insurance (EI) withholdings. Chart also indicates whether the GST/HST has to be included in the value of the table benefit for income tax purposes.
